summary: Ganesha is a popular and important Hindu god, easily recognized by his elephant head and four arms. He is known as the remover of obstacles, bringing good luck and wisdom. People worship him at the start of new projects and seek his blessing for success. Ganesha is considered the son of Parvati and Shiva and is revered across different Hindu traditions. His stories and importance are described in ancient Hindu texts, making him a significant figure in Hinduism.
title: Ganesha
